conclusion: Analyze the flow direction and path of liquid through baffles A, B, and C.
Baffle A: Liquid flows horizontally from left to right.
Baffle B: Liquid flows vertically downward.
Baffle C: Liquid flows diagonally from top-left to bottom-right.
Baffle A: Liquid exits on the right side.
Baffle B: Liquid exits at the bottom.
Baffle C: Liquid exits on the bottom-right corner.
After Baffle A: Liquid flows horizontally towards containers below.
After Baffle B: Liquid flows vertically towards containers on the right.
After Baffle C: Liquid flows diagonally towards container on the far right.
From Baffle A: Liquid flows into container F.
From Baffle B: Liquid flows into container E.
From Baffle C: Liquid flows into container F.
Final answer: Liquid from A flows into F, from B into E, from C into F.
